DeleteAccount.Title: Delete Account
DeleteAccount.Subtitle: Are you sure you want to delete your account?

About.FirstParagraph: This means that all of your assets and data associated with your account will be permanently deleted.
About.SecondParagraph: Unfortunately, this action is irreversible and cannot be reversed in the future. We understand that this decision may not be easy for you to make.
About.ThirdParagraph: Therefore, we allow you to have 30 days to log in and cancel your account deletion request. Once this period has passed, your account will be permanently deleted.
About.FourthParagraph: If you wish to delete your account, please select a reason from the dropdown menu below :

Reason.First: I don’t feel safe on Beamco
Reason.Fourth: I spend too much time using Beamco
Reason.Five: I don’t understand how to use Beamco

RecoverAccount.Title: Account Deletion
RecoverAccount.FirstParagraph: You have signed in to your account which is currently undergoing the deletion process.
RecoverAccount.SecondParagraph: Please keep in mind that you can still recover your account within the next 30 days.
RecoverAccount.ThirdParagraph: However, once you delete your account, all of your data, including your saved preferences and settings, will be permanently erased.
